name: Signature Series Maduro Robusto Grande
additionalNotes: The Hype: The Kinky Friedman Signature Series Maduro Bundle Cigar uses an Ecuadorian Habano Maduro wrapper to give this blend a full body profile while retaining the smoothness and complexity of the natural wrapper. A Nicaraguan Sumatra binder for even burn and white ash and Nicaraguan Ligero, Viso and Seco fillers. Notes of coffee and cocoa.
